title: So many problems with the new client.
body:
Ok, I have not seen any of these problems address and it is starting to get frustrating.
I am not the only one with these problems, it is literately everyone I know that player league of legends.

The new client performs very poorly to the point I would rather be using the old client.
There have been multiple times where I get into a ranked lobby and can not select or ban a champion and I get a dodge timer for it, this is not fair as it is purely the client that has made it so I could not pick a champion.
Doing anything in a champ select screen is slower than it should be.
(Mostly in ARAM) Swapping champions with others is VERY slow, a lot of the time i offer up a trade they have already rolled a champion but it takes a good 30 seconds for that to reflect on anyone elses screen.
Trade offers in general are really slow, it takes about 10 seconds for a trade to go through once you have clicked the confirm button.

There are other UI problems but these are what I can think of off the top of my head.
Overall the new client is very unresponsive compared to legacy and when it is responsive doesn't work properly.
I have not seen 1 bug fix for this client and it is starting to get quite frustrating to play on it.

replies.body: I love how there is a specific board for client discussion and to report problems with the client, yet it does not seem as any moderator even looks at it, shows how much they really want to fix the client...

Agreed. Especially the ARAM reroll/ trade thing. I've had it multiple times where i've tried to trade at the same time they have rerolled, and i am unable to do ANYTHING. Can't change summs / runes/ masteries.
